page.title: 17SHIPLEY
page.content: Some of the Victorian farm buildings have been restored and in one block school parties can eat and sleep while they spend a week working with the farm animals like milking cows, feeding pigs and collecting eggs. People can walk in the park to see the wildlife, we know that there are foxes roaming around in the countryside and last year there were cubs. There is also a cricket club in Shipley called Shipley Hall, with a newish pavilon including a bar. There is a restaurant as well as the Coppice Inn, for people to go and have a meal and drink. They have outside seats, swings and slides for children. There is a pond behind it and if you are lucky in the evening you can see the fish jumping out of the pond.
